original_text: it is a chronic leprous disease in the skin of his body, and the priest shall pronounce him unclean. He shall not shut him up, for he is unclean.
korean_text: 이는 그의 피부의 오랜 나병이라 제사장이 부정하다 할 것이요 그가 이미 부정하였은즉 가두어두지는 않을 것이며

sentences.original_text: it is a chronic leprous disease in the skin of his body
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그의 몸 피부에 만성적인 나병입니다.

sentences.original_text: the priest shall pronounce him unclean
He shall not shut him up
